title: Installation issue: 'spack install -j40 paraview@5.7.0+python3+mpi' paraview cannot find python development
body:
If I specify by hand 
Python3_INCLUDE_DIR=/home/danlipsa/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.7.9-rqkbuftaryrcsjtztqus7cajncu6sm2a/include/python3.7m
and
Python3_LIBRARY_RELEASE=/home/danlipsa/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-broadwell/gcc-9.3.0/python-3.7.9-rqkbuftaryrcsjtztqus7cajncu6sm2a/lib/libpython3.7m.so

the compilation succeds.

[~/projects/spack (fix-sensei *$%)]$ spack install -j40 paraview@5.7.0+python3+mpi
